Interface ExecutionStage

All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultLivenessProbe, DefaultReadinessProbe, InitialState, ProbeHandlerTerm, ProbesTask, State, Task, Terminal, TerminalState
public interface ExecutionStage
A MiA execution stage.
Author:
anthony

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    <R> CompletableFuture<R>
    callBefore(TimeLimit limit, Callable<R> callable)
    Implementation of Async.callBefore(Executor, TimeLimit, Callable) which uses a local Executor and can implement context related checks.

  • Method Details

    • callBefore

      <R> CompletableFuture<R> callBefore(TimeLimit limit, Callable<R> callable)
      Implementation of Async.callBefore(Executor, TimeLimit, Callable) which uses a local Executor and can implement context related checks.
      If at the execution time the teminal is terminated then the call will be completed exceptionally by an TerminatedTerminalException.
      Type Parameters:
      R - The return Type
      Parameters:
      limit - The TimeLimit for this call.
      callable - The Callable to execute.
      Returns:
      a CompletableFuture

    • isActive

      boolean isActive()
      Getter to know if the ExecutionStage is active.
      Returns:
      True if the ExecutionStage is active.
